website_summaries.verdict: A tall Santa inflatable with the added bonus of motion. An exciting option for kids and the young at heart.
pros: Features a lighted, telescopic design that makes Santa descend and pop out of the chimney
Stands 6 feet tall, so it will catch a lot of attention in your yard
cons: Price falls on the higher end of the spectrum

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical because some of the reviews, but Santa worked perfect for a good month being left on 24/7, even thru heavy rains. I was afraid the water would collect in the chimney but it did not. While his arms kept him from going all the way down and he more or less leaned backwards he always rose back up. Fun decoration and will look forward to next year
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just an OK performer and value.
customer_reviews.text: Phoenixreal 6 Foot Christmas Inflatables Santa in Chimney, Airblown Animated Up and Down Santa Claus, Lighted for Home Outdoor Yard Lawn Decoration "Comes with stakes and ropes" Yea...none to be seen. Glad I have a bunch from previous decorations. Santa only goes partly down the chimney. Previous version I had put some weights on the bottom to help pull him down. Sadly missing and needed here. Looks decent...but the missing parts and Santa not performing are drawbacks.
customer_reviews.author: Mougly

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with this inflatable. Fans that are supposed to make Santa go up and down don't do the job. Seems like a cheap design. Instead of Santa going up and down he stays inflated the whole time and ends up flopping over the side of the chimney. Save your money and buy one from a higher quality manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: BlinkinLi9hts

customer_reviews.title: I guess this was never inspected
customer_reviews.text: The wires were never connected for the Santa to pop up. I had to do it myself. When Santa finally popped up he fell over. I used it for a couple of week. Just not happy with it. It will probably end up in the garbage for next season. Don’t think we will be using this again
customer_reviews.author: Lyn

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Tried 2 different ones. First one didn't raise Santa out of the chimney and second one didn't inflate Santa at all. Returned both items.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Ann

customer_reviews.title: This thrilled Grand-kids and Grandma too!
customer_reviews.text: Works like a champ, and more fun than you can stand with Santa coming up and going down the chimney.
customer_reviews.author: Richard A Bohler

customer_reviews.title: Easier than I thought
customer_reviews.text: This was so easy. After reading the instructions, I had no trouble at all. It looks great.
customer_reviews.author: MsHilly69

customer_reviews.title: Defective, defective
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these within a week. On the first one, the Santa stopped going up and down. So I reordered. on the second one Santa doesn't inflate at all, Two defectives in a row mean don't buy this crappy product!!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Peeps

customer_reviews.title: Packaged well, easy to set up, Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Mounts easily on a slanted roof, set it on a piece of plywood. Everyone loves him!! Arrived on time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: RISING SANTA
customer_reviews.text: ADORABLE ,I LOVE IT THAT IT POP UP AND RETRACTS JUST BIG ENOUGH FOR YARD WITH THE OTHER DECORS , TOO BAD IT DOESNT TALK OR HO! HO! HO!
customer_reviews.author: jean

customer_reviews.title: Cute decoration!
customer_reviews.text: Looks great! Such a fun addition to our yard display!
customer_reviews.author: chris carradine

customer_reviews.title: Check Voltage of Product
customer_reviews.text: Forgot to check voltage was compatible with New Zealand Voltage, so had to buy a step down transformer from 220 v to 110 v. used for lawn display Christmas Decorations. Otherwise pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Brownie

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great inflatable at a great price! Very colorful Santa emerges from the chimney, so cute! So easy to set up, too!! I'm very pleased with this item.
customer_reviews.author: franny jean

customer_reviews.title: Its ok
customer_reviews.text: Light material, takes a few to inflate cause fan motors are cheap/weak
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work
customer_reviews.text: I would not even rate this one star when we received it in the mail and plugged it in it instantly didn’t work. I returned it right away.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It was just like advertised!
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the inflatable, it was so easy to set up and take down!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara J Taylor

customer_reviews.title: He liked it
customer_reviews.text: Like it it was for my son for the yard
customer_reviews.author: Julie Denison

customer_reviews.title: It works well and good colors
customer_reviews.text: like it ok overall - used for Christmas decorations for front yard
customer_reviews.author: Ruthie Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Does not work! Beware!
customer_reviews.text: Does not work!!! Very disappointing. Having to return for a refund
customer_reviews.author: Olivia W. May

customer_reviews.title: Bashful Santa
customer_reviews.text: Santa does not pop up all the way as advertised
customer_reviews.author: Andy

product_meta.title: Phoenixreal 6 Foot Christmas Inflatables Santa in Chimney, Airblown Animated Up and Down Santa Claus, Lighted for Home Outdoor Yard Lawn Decoration
product_meta.description:
Bring some holiday cheer to your yard with this eye-catching Outdoor Inflatable Santa in Chimney from Phoenixreal, Our self-inflating Christmas decorations feature internal LED lighting for a joyous glow at night.
Features:
-Weather-resistant polyester material provides many years of festive fun.
-Animated Airblown inflatables is sure to be enjoyed by family, friends and passersby all season long.
-Self-Inflating and deflating in seconds, simple operation as easy as ABC, this Inflatable Animated Up and Down Santa in Chimney will be presented in front of your family in seconds.
-Illuminated with LED lights and durably constructed with a fully integrated motor supplying continuous flow of air to keep item inflated.

Cautions:
Do not inflate during storms or strong winds
Protect fan and power cord from water, fire and severe weather
Not for use in temperatures below 14 degrees F (or -10 degrees C)
Not for children under 3 years
In order to avoid pricking please keep away from sharp tools when inflating

Specifications:
Material: 190T Polyester Fabric
Overall Size: 6FT (H)
Motor: 12V 0.8A x2
Adapter: 110V 2000MA
Lights: 2 PCS GROUP LED LIGHTS
Weight: 4.7lbs
feature_bullets: Durable Christmas Blow up Santa in Chimney: Made of Polyester Fabrics, Weather Proof and Fade Resistant, Plug Into Any 110 AC Outlet
Convenient Xmas Outdoor Inflatables: Self Inflates in Seconds, Deflates Back Down for Easy Storage
Lighted Adorable Inflatable Santa in Chimney: Internally LED Bulbs Lighting Up for Better Nighttime Viewing
Everything Included: Inflator Fan, Ground Stakes and Tether Ropes, Voltage Transformer
The Perfect Christmas Inflatable Decorations is great for Indoor or Outdoor Use, Christmas Eve Party and New Year

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars36 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
